description:
The fight for city turf is cut short when breakfast is served. Dazai and Atsushi are on clean-up duty, and the lockers are in pretty rough shape. Higuchi forces Akutagawa and Nakahara into an awkward situation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Real / What`s Inside the Locker? / An Unfruitful Exchange
Bungou Stray Dogs Real / Locker no Nakami wa Nan Desho na? / Kamiawanai Yaritori
文豪ストレイドッグスREAL / ロッカーの中身はなんでしょな? / 嚙み合わないやりとり
